requestParams.name: attributes
requestParams.desc: 返回属性（1, "商品基础信息"，3, "库存"）

requestParams.name: child_category
requestParams.desc: 类目筛选的时候是否包括子类目

requestParams.name: selling_channel
requestParams.example: 门店2,微商城4,门店与网店6

requestParams.name: sort_type
requestParams.desc: 排序顺序  1 升序 2 降序

requestParams.name: warehouse_ids
requestParams.desc: 仓库id(目前仅支持查询单仓)

children.name: sellChannel
children.desc: 销售渠道：1 未设置，2门店 4 网店 6 门店+网店

'[1,3]', 'name_or_sku_no' => '测试', 'page_no' => '1', 'page_size' => '4', 'source' => 'test', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';

token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['attributes']="[1,3]"
params['name_or_sku_no']="测试"
params['page_no']=1
params['page_size']=4
params['source']="test"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.product.skus.search', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)
